title: Note - Out of the total premium amount so collected under rehabilitation scheme under this these Regulations, 2/3rd shall be kept in a separate account to be utilized as shelter fund for the State of Maharashtra and 1/3rd shall be deposited at the District Office of the Town Planning Department
clause_text: Note - Out of the total premium amount so collected under rehabilitation scheme under this these Regulations, 2/3rd shall be kept in a separate account to be utilized as shelter fund for the State of Maharashtra and 1/3rd shall be deposited at the District Office of the Town Planning Department. Urban Renewal Scheme (URS) shall be applicable for all Corporations as given below.
section: Provision relating to Permanent Transit Camp Tenements for Slum Rehabilitation Scheme implemented on open plot / non-slum plot.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
